title: Going Seventeen
overview: Initially a series of behind-the-scenes vlogs, Going Seventeen has taken a more structured route since mid-2019 and is now a reality-variety show with themed episodes. Every week, the members of Seventeen play games or participate in a variety of activities for everyone's delight and entertainment. Season 2021's keyword is "Watch What You Say", meaning that anything the members say can and will be turned into content...
